heading: Guild
text: Guild Tokens are inspired by the DKP system (Dragon Kill Points) familiar to Old-School gamers, allowing gaming communities to create their own in-guild economies.

heading: Soulbound
text: Thanks to Soulbound Tokens technology, we enable players to create their gaming profiles or digital gamer passports on Blockchain, preparing them for the Web3 world.

heading: Games Items
text: The tokenization of in-game currencies and items, specifically in Web2 games, will become a reality through the Javes. Players will be able to exchange their game assets for specialized tokens that grant them the right to receive equivalent assets from the ecosystem.

heading: for In-Game Challenges
text: Javes will introduce a feature that allows players to earn rewards for overcoming tough hard challenges in games through unique NFTs, thereby converting their gaming skill into the value of those NFTs.

heading: Collaboration with
text: By creating a trading ecosystem, we are essentially building a market with millions of players that attracts Web3 game developers, opening up a wide range of collaboration opportunities.

heading: the Token
text: The Javes token offers unique benefits to encourage purchases and is available through both Web3 and Web2 interfaces, making it accessible to players new to blockchain.

heading: Wallet
text: Every player who consciously decides to join the Web3 world and use decentralized solutions will gain access to the Javes OnChain Wallet designed for gamers.
